page.title: 08The Nypro Explosion 1
page.content: I was having a nap:my husband was out gardening.Suddenly I was woken by my husband trying to open the door it seemed to be jammed.Then the front window shattered and blew in.Before I knew what had happened there was the loudest bang I had ever heard.At first I thought it was the gas cooker.After we had been told not to go inside the police evacuated everyone to the technical college in Scunthorpe where a hot meal was waiting.It was a few days before we knew the cause of the explosion.Our house was one of the most damaged in Burton but it wasn't as bad as the ones in Flixborough. I thought that the rescue services were excellent the way they worked.28 men died in this terrible disaster.This was one of the saddest events I can remember.
